        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Focus Activity Using RAFT</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fokus-Aktivität Mit FLOSS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activité De Foyer En utilisant le RADEAU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividade Do Foco Usando a JANGADA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività Del Fuoco Usando ZATTERA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητα εστίασης που χρησιμοποιεί το ΣΥΝΟΛΟ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividad Del Foco Usando la BALSA</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Better writing requires consideration of RAFT: Role, Audience, Format and Topic.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Besseres Schreiben benötigt Erwägung des 
FLOSSES: Rolle, Publikum, Format und Thema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une meilleure écriture exige la considération du
RADEAU : Rôle, assistances, format et sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A escrita melhor requer a consideração da 
JANGADA: Papel, audiências, formato e tópico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scrittura migliore richiede la considerazione 
della ZATTERA: Ruolo, pubblici, formato e soggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καλύτερα να γράψει απαιτεί την εκτίμηση του ΣΥΝΟΛΟΥ: 
Ρόλος, ακροατήριο, μορφή και θέμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una escritura mejor requiere la consideración de 
la BALSA: Papel, audiencias, formato y asunto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
